get.description: Returns a list with all the activity types.
Returns an object that contains all the existing reference data.
Returns a list with all the authority types.
Return a list with all supported base maps and availability for supported countries.
Returns a country object if a valid identifier is provided.
Returns a list with all the supported countries.
Returns a list with all the entitlement types.
Returns a list with all the exception types.
Returns a list with all the exemption time types.
Returns a list with all the exemption types.
Returns a list with all the facility types.
Returns a list with all the fuel types.
Returns a list with all the moving exception types.
Returns a list with all the moving restriction types.
Returns a list with all the note visibility types.
Returns a list with all the on-street parking types.
Returns a list with all the supported payment methods.
Returns a list with all the permit types.
Returns a country region object if a valid identifier is provided.
Returns a list with all the supported country regions.

post.description: Updates the specified country region information.

get.description: Returns a list with all the restriction types.
Returns a list with all the special restrictions.
Returns a list with all the vehicle types.
Returns a list with all the zone types.

ActivityType.description: Indicates what a vehicle operator can do at an OSP

movingExceptionTypes.description: Exception types for moving traffic features

movingRestrictionTypes.description: Restriction types for moving traffic features

All.description: A collection of all reference types

movingRestrictionTypeId.description: Id of the moving restriction type this exception type is applicable to

canHaveRestrictions.description: Indicates whether authorities of this type can have default restrictions

canHaveShape.description: Indicates whether authorities of this type can have a shape

availableInCountries.description: Indicates in which countries this base map has tiles available

specialDays.description: List of holidays and named days that apply to this country.

bounds.description: A rectangular area indicating roughly where the country is situated

defaultBaseMapId.description: The default basemap to use for this country

entitlementTypes.description: Entitlement types available in this country

restrictionTypes.description: Restriction types available in this country

code.description: Shorthand code that represents this entitlement.

restrictionTypeIds.description: Indicates the restriction types that this entitlement can apply to

applicableExemptionTypeIds.description: Indicates the exemption types that can apply to this entitlement

hasTariff.description: Indicates whether this entitlement needs a tariff

restrictionTypeLegalNames.description: Indicates the legal names of the restriction type that this entitlement can apply to

EntitlementType.description: Indicates the condition on which availability of an OSP depends

date.description: Date when the event takes place

ExceptionType.description: Indicates how operating hours can be altered because of holidays or named days

ExemptionTimeType.description: Indicates the different definitions of when an exemption can be active

ExemptionType.description: Indicates what exemption there could be for a specific activity, vehicle or person

FacilityType.description: Indicates a facility that is available at an OSP

NoteVisibilityType.description: Indicates when a note should be displayed or not

OnStreetParkingType.description: Represents a type of On-Street Parking entity

PaymentMethod.description: Indicates the method that you pay for a stay at an OSP

PermitType.description: Indicates a permit a vehicle operator has

countryId.description: Id of the Country this region belongs to

venues.description: A list of venues that are available in the region. Venues are linked to zones and will affect the operating hours on dates where there's an event at the venue

code.description: Shorthand code that represents this entitlement.

canHaveTariff.description: Indicates whether there could be a tariff attached to this restriction type

defaultWidth.description: Indicates the default width of this restriction type in meters.

isTroItem.description: Indicates that this restriction type is classed as part of Traffic Regulation Orders.

legalName.description: The restriction type's alternative name used on legal traffic order documents.

isHoliday.description: Indicates whether this day is considered a holiday

dates.description: Dates on which this day is in effect

SpecialRestriction.description: Indicates special restrictions that apply to an On-Street parking entity

eventsMustSupplyHours.description: Indicates whether an event at this venue supplies the hours or whether it should take the hours from the applicable operating hours

events.description: List of events that will take place at this venue

canHaveRestrictions.description: Indicates whether zones of this type can have default restrictions

canHaveShape.description: Indicates whether zones of this type can have a shape
